course_title: Artificial Intelligence in Health Care for Professionals
class_notes: JM Students only.  Per ABA rules, JD and LLM students will receive credit for JM courses
course_description: The Artificial Intelligence in Health Care for Professionals course will discuss the law and ethics of AI use across health care organizations, including operational improvement AI, diagnostic AI, and AI-enabled medical devices.
prerequisites: This course is for  students enrolled in the Juris Master program.
sections: Class Nbr: 5308, Section #: 001, Type: SEM, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: C. Tschider, Status: Open
